sub_title: Landscape & Garden Architect/Master Planner along with Hospitality, Service & Retail Manager
summary:
As a landscape architect and master planner, my primary goal is to improve our (living) environment. My designs have a strong connection with the spirit and characteristics of a site, based on thorough research and analysis. Sustainable approaches, town planning and cultural history are integrated in my visions, concepts, designs and details. Therefore I  work together with and can understand multiple different disciplines in the field of public space to produce integral large scale plans with a focus on practicability and understanding on lower scale levels. Management and communication on this entire process is guaranteed with a focus on feasibility and project costs. Respect to different (design) cultures, desires are off course leading. Besides large scale project, I also work as a garden (and interior) architect. I gathered a network of suppliers and craftsmen to guarantee the construction of projects and am the spokesman for clients and constructors.

My strength is to have a creative clear overview and understanding in large complex systems, such as landscapes, and the interrelations in them between participants. In my opinion this 'helicopter'-view is a surplus in multiple varying businesses and fields of work. At first this became clear in my garden projects and their construction. But this appeared also in my career to become catering manager. A rational and creative approach as a successful entrepreneur within a large organisation resulted in the development of new food concepts and new presentation or selling methods. In this career I also broadened my empathic skills, such as team management and coaching within my team, as well as setting up methods and management of communication systems between us and other outsourcing facility service partners. Primary focus are the desires, experiences and appreciation by our clients.

treasury_media.title: Portfolio Landscape Architecture of Niels Frencken
treasury_media.description: This is an overview of my projects, work and publications as a landscape architect. It shows project of my time at university in Wageningen and Munich as well as my time in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and my development afterwards. For more information or for a file with a better resolution, feel free to contact me.

treasury_media.title: Impression Garden Architecture by Niels Frencken
treasury_media.description: This is a small impression of what I did as a Garden Architect. For more information or for a file with a better resolution, feel free to contact me.

authors.headline: Landscape & Garden Architect/Master Planner along with Hospitality, Service & Retail Manager

profile_positions.description: I worked myself up by several promotions within the Avenance Company and later in the Compass Group (after Avenance was taken over by the Compass Group). Now I am the Catering Manager for Eurest at the office of EY (former Ernst & Young) in Eindhoven. I am responsible for multiple hospitality services at this office. This varies from restaurant management, coffee bar management till all banqueting and party management for our internal guests as well as for their clients, who visit our office. Besides that I am responsible to guarantee perfect cooperation between us and other facility services as well as for all management aspects within my own team.
profile_positions.title: Catering Manager

profile_positions.description: Besides my work as catering manager I work as a part-time garden architect. This is one of my hobbies in which I use my concept and design as a landscape architect. I gathered a network of suppliers and craftsmen to guarantee the construction of projects and I serve as the spokesman for clients and constructors. I helped friends and family to update their gardens.
profile_positions.title: Garden Architect

company.name: Hollandia Lil Bi'a // Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

profile_positions.title: Landscape Architect/Master Planner

profile_positions.description: I did my Internship for my Master Degree at BRO Vught, nowadays located in Boxtel, The Netherlands. This is an advice and design office with multiple fields of work available within their own offices. This allowed me to work in teams of urban planners, infrastructural engineers, planning engineers, ecologists and landscape architects on urban and rural designs and from micro till macro scale level.
profile_positions.title: Trainee Landscape Architect
